text: I haven’t jail broken a phone since the 3G, I just don’t see a compelling reason to anymore. The reason I did it then was to get around the tethering restrictions that att had at the time, but now I can’t really think of any features that I would want my phone to have that it doesn’t already.
Since it's a bootrom exploit hopefully that means people can install an alternative OS.
A chance for postmarketOS to come for iPhones?
